languages.text: Dismantling Attack also cripples the enemy, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −30 until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Препарирование цели также наносит противнику увечье, уменьшая значения {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g} на 30 до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: - The attack also cripples the enemy, reducing their Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill by -30 until the end of combat.
Dismantling Attack also cripples the enemy, reducing their Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill by −30 until the end of combat.

Препарирование цели также наносит противнику увечье, уменьшая значения Ближнего Боя и Дальнего Боя на 30 до конца боя.

languages.text: 解体攻击还会削弱敌人的能力，使其{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低30点，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Dismantling Attack also cripples the enemy, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −30 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 解体{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}还会削弱敌人的能力，使其{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}和{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低30点，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: El Ataque desmantelador también lisia al enemigo, reduciendo su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} en −30 hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Dismantling Attack also cripples the enemy, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −30 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Ataque{/g} desmantelador también lisia al enemigo, reduciendo su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} en −30 hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 攻撃解体が敵を損傷させ、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道技能{/g}を−30減少させる。
languages.original_text: Dismantling Attack also cripples the enemy, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −30 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}解体が敵を損傷させ、戦闘終了まで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道技能{/g}を-30減少させる。

languages.text: Entwaffnender Angriff verkrüppelt den Feind außerdem, was seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeitgkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −30 reduziert.
languages.original_text: Dismantling Attack also cripples the enemy, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −30 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Entwaffnender Angriff{/g} verkrüppelt den Feind außerdem, was seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes um −30 reduziert.

languages.text: Attaque de Démantèlement pénalise également l'ennemi, réduisant sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g} de −30 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Dismantling Attack also cripples the enemy, reducing their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} by −30 until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Attaque{/g} de Démantèlement pénalise également l'ennemi, réduisant sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'Arme{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g} de -30 jusqu'à la fin du combat.
